member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridCollectionExportExtension.ExportToExcel(Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.Data.ICollectionViewAdv,Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions)
member.summary: This method exports the dataGrid to excel by considering Grouping,Sorting,Filtering,Summaries,Paging,NestedGrid,CellTypes.
member.param: Class which is used to set the Exporting Options

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridCollectionExportExtension.SetIndentColumnWidth(Syncfusion.XlsIO.IWorksheet,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets the ColumnWidth for the specified cells as 20.
member.param: Start: Specifies the start indent column index
end : Specifies the End column index of indent cells

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridCollectionExportExtension.SetColumnWidth(Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.SfDataGrid,Syncfusion.XlsIO.IWorksheet,System.Int32,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String})
member.summary: Sets the column width from Grid To Excel for all columns starting from specified column index.
member.param: ColumnIndex: Specifies the First Column index

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridCollectionExportExtension.CreateCollectionView(Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.SfDataGrid,System.Object,System.String,Syncfusion.Data.IPropertyAccessProvider)
member.summary: Creates the new CollectionViewAdv and adds the Summaries, Groups, SortDescriptions.

member.name: M:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.GridCollectionExportExtension.ExportCellValueToExcel(Syncfusion.XlsIO.IRange,System.Object,System.Type)
member.summary: Exports the cell value from datagrid to excel.
member.param: IRange - to which the cellvalue is to be exported.
Object which holds the value that is exported to excel
Determines the property type (Ex: String, Double, Date)

member.name: T:Syncfusion.UI.Xaml.Grid.Converter.ExcelExportingOptions
member.summary: Class which is used to set the ExportingOptions. user can pass this class as an argument to the ExportToExcelMethod.
